extensionDescription.message: Opensource song recognition extension using shazam API

noAudioElementsDetected.description: Error message when no audio elements detected

songNotRecognized.description: Error message when song not recognized

noAudioRecordedFromMicrophone.description: Error message when no audio recorded from microphone

songNotRecognizedFromMicrophone.message: Song was not recognized from microphone...
songNotRecognizedFromMicrophone.description: Error message when song not recognized from microphone

failedToAccessMicrophone.message: Failed to access microphone or record audio
failedToAccessMicrophone.description: Error message when microphone access fails

recognitionRulesDescription.message: Define recording lengths (ms) and the backend order to try when recognition fails.

recognitionRulesMobileHint.message: Mobile: Long press on a chip to enter reorder mode, then tap other chips to reorder.

settingsResetToDefault.description: Notification message when settings are reset

backendsClickToEnable.message: Backends: click to enable/disable; drag to reorder (enabled only)

atLeastOneFallbackRuleMustExist.message: At least one fallback rule must exist
atLeastOneFallbackRuleMustExist.description: Error message when trying to delete last rule

atLeastOneBackendMustBeEnabled.message: At least one backend must be enabled
atLeastOneBackendMustBeEnabled.description: Error message when trying to disable last backend

tapOtherChipsToReorder.message: Tap other chips to reorder, tap again to finish

areYouSureToClearHistories.message: Are you sure to clear histories?

chooseUpTo5StreamingProviders.message: Choose up to 5 streaming providers to display when a song is recognized. You can drag and drop to reorder them.

enableExperimentalFixDescription.message: On certain websites, such as some gaming sites, AudioBufferSourceNode is used for audio playback. To allow Librezam to function on these sites, this option must be enabled. However, this feature is experimental and very unstable, and may cause critical bugs such as audio delay or duplication.

hostsToPreventAudioDuplication.description: Hosts to prevent audio duplication label

hostsToPreventAudioDuplicationDescriptio.message: If the volume doubles when attempting to recognise a song on Librezam, please add that site's hostname. Adding host here will have no effect when the issue is caused by the experimental fix.
hostsToPreventAudioDuplicationDescriptio.description: Hosts to prevent audio duplication description

hostsToPreventAppendHeadlessAudio.message: Hosts to prevent append headless audio
hostsToPreventAppendHeadlessAudio.description: Hosts to prevent append headless audio label

hostsToPreventAppendHeadlessAudioDescrip.message: If you encounter issues with certain websites whilst just Librezam is installed, add the host here.
hostsToPreventAppendHeadlessAudioDescrip.description: Hosts to prevent append headless audio description

hostsToBeTreatedAsCORSSource.message: Hosts to be treated as a CORS source
hostsToBeTreatedAsCORSSource.description: Hosts to be treated as CORS source label

hostsToBeTreatedAsCORSSourceDescription.message: If you encounter sites where audio is muted and elements are not detected when attempting to recognise songs, add the host here.
hostsToBeTreatedAsCORSSourceDescription.description: Hosts to be treated as CORS source description

pleaseAllowMicrophoneAccess.message: Please allow microphone access from the dialogue box
